verses.verse: Now <WG1161> of <WG1909> the things which we have spoken <WG3004> this is the sum: <WG2774> We have <WG2192> such <WG5108> a high priest, <WG749> who <WG3739> is set <WG2523> on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the <WG3588> throne <WG2362> of the <WG3588> Majesty <WG3172> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> heavens; <WG3772>

A minister <WG3011> of the <WG3588> sanctuary, <WG39> and <WG2532> of the <WG3588> true <WG228> tabernacle, <WG4633> which <WG3739> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> pitched, <WG4078> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> man. <WG444>

For <WG1063> every <WG3956> high priest <WG749> is ordained <WG2525> to offer <WG4374> <WG5037> gifts <WG1435> and <WG2532> sacrifices: <WG2378> wherefore <WG3606> it is of necessity <WG316> that this man <WG5126> have <WG2192> somewhat <WG5100> <WG3739> also <WG2532> to offer. <WG4374>

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> he <WG3303> were <WG2258> on <WG1909> earth, <WG1093> he should not <WG3761> be <WG2258> <WG302> a priest, <WG2409> seeing that there are <WG5607> priests <WG2409> that offer <WG4374> gifts <WG1435> according <WG2596> to the <WG3588> law: <WG3551>

Who <WG3748> serve <WG3000> unto the example <WG5262> and <WG2532> shadow <WG4639> of heavenly things, <WG2032> as <WG2531> Moses <WG3475> was admonished of God <WG5537> when he was about <WG3195> to make <WG2005> the <WG3588> tabernacle: <WG4633> for, <WG1063> See, <WG3708> saith <WG5346> he, that thou make <WG4160> all things <WG3956> according <WG2596> to the <WG3588> pattern <WG5179> showed <WG1166> to thee <WG4671> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> mount. <WG3735>

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> hath he obtained <WG5177> a more excellent <WG1313> ministry, <WG3009> by how much <WG3745> also <WG2532> he is <WG2076> the mediator <WG3316> of a better <WG2909> covenant, <WG1242> which <WG3748> was established <WG3549> upon <WG1909> better <WG2909> promises. <WG1860>
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> that <WG1565> first <WG4413> covenant had been <WG2258> faultless, <WG273> then should no <WG3756> <WG302> place <WG5117> have been sought <WG2212> for the second. <WG1208>

For <WG1063> finding fault <WG3201> with them, <WG846> he saith, <WG3004> Behold, <WG2400> the days <WG2250> come, <WG2064> saith <WG3004> the Lord, <WG2962> when <WG2532> I will make <WG4931> a new <WG2537> covenant <WG1242> with <WG1909> the <WG3588> house <WG3624> of Israel <WG2474> and <WG2532> with <WG1909> the <WG3588> house <WG3624> of Judah: <WG2455>

Not <WG3756> according <WG2596> to the <WG3588> covenant <WG1242> that <WG3739> I made <WG4160> with their <WG846> fathers <WG3962> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> when I <WG3450> took <WG1949> them <WG846> by the <WG3588> hand <WG5495> to lead <WG1806> them <WG846> out of <WG1537> the land <WG1093> of Egypt; <WG125> because <WG3754> they <WG846> continued <WG1696> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> covenant, <WG1242> and I <WG2504> regarded them not, <WG272> <WG846> saith <WG3004> the Lord. <WG2962>

For <WG3754> this <WG3778> is the <WG3588> covenant <WG1242> that <WG3739> I will make <WG1303> with the <WG3588> house <WG3624> of Israel <WG2474> after <WG3326> those <WG1565> days, <WG2250> saith <WG3004> the Lord; <WG2962> I will put <WG1325> my <WG3450> laws <WG3551> into <WG1519> their <WG846> mind, <WG1271> and <WG2532> write <WG1924> them <WG846> in <WG1909> their <WG846> hearts: <WG2588> and <WG2532> I will be <WG2071> to them <WG846> a <WG1519> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> they <WG846> shall be <WG2071> to me <WG3427> a <WG1519> people: <WG2992>

And <WG2532> they shall not <WG3364> teach <WG1321> every man <WG1538> his <WG848> neighbor, <WG4139> and <WG2532> every man <WG1538> his <WG848> brother, <WG80> saying, <WG3004> Know <WG1097> the <WG3588> Lord: <WG2962> for <WG3754> all <WG3956> shall know <WG1492> me, <WG3165> from <WG575> the least <WG3398> <WG846> to <WG2193> the greatest. <WG3173> <WG846>

For <WG3754> I will be <WG2071> merciful <WG2436> to their <WG846> unrighteousness, <WG93> and <WG2532> their <WG846> sins <WG266> and <WG2532> their <WG846> iniquities <WG458> will I remember <WG3415> no more. <WG3364> <WG2089>

In that he saith, <WG3004> A new <WG2537> covenant, he hath made the first old. <WG3822> <WG3588> <WG4413> Now <WG1161> that which decayeth <WG3822> and <WG2532> waxeth old <WG1095> is ready to vanish away. <WG1451> <WG854>
